entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Tracadie-Sheila
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:31 PM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bas Caraquet 01:00 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023
Temperature: -8.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -14.5°C
Wind: WNW 21 km/h gust 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023
